appeal.name: Oscar Jin
appeal.quote: The world is increasing in need of a person that can think interdisciplinary, work internationally. I am intend to become just that person.
appeal.title: iOS / Web Developer, Designer

description: Despite the skills and experiences, my contribution will not limited to a specific area. I embrace the change and constantly evolve to provide the best service my teammate can demand.
heading: I strive my best to not let you down.
